Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute at Lake Shore Drive/Recreational Drive
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, IrvPk & Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Irving Park and Lake Shore Drive:  due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Recreational Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
